Name: War Theatre: Blood of Winter
About the game: From the developers of War Theatre comes the next series installment, Blood of Winter. In this free-to-start turn-based strategy RPG, return to Kasalli, where the Endless War continues to rage and powerful new forces converge to determine the fate of the world. Take on players worldwide with one of seven unique hero characters while completing quests to unlock new perks and gain an edge on your competitors. Multiplayer is free to play, while the single player campaigns are paid dlc, along with the ability to play with any hero. Features: 7 Hero Characters 30 Multiplayer Maps More than 50 challenges to complete Online Multiplayer
